name: The Hotel 2
description:
A homeless man mistakenly entered a hotel that had been closed because of a terrorist incident. Then came a series of fantastic things.The measuring cup on the door, the confined girl, the young man and woman in a car accident.What will be the fate of the tramp waiting for him? Will he eventually be able to escape from the hotel?     Although this game is a terror decryption game, it has fewer frightening elements. Players can safely experience the whole game content. Auto-saving is set up in more important locations, avoiding the need to restart because of forgetting to save the game.
    而且这个游戏包含一些动作元素，以及各种游戏，玩家需要解决多个难题，帮助流浪汉找到出路。操作方法：方向键/鼠标点击控制人移动输入键/ Z键确认Esc / X键取消A键攻击Q键设置目标S键跳转
